<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Unfollow a Collection"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/collections/{collection-id}/followers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Unfollow a collection for a game. Successful request will return `204 No Content`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"The ID of the game to which the collection belongs.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"collection-id","in":"path","description":"The ID of the collection to unfollow.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
